author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sichuan Chuanhuan Technology says dividend payment date on May 11
text:
May 4(Reuters) - Sichuan Chuanhuan Technology Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 10 yuan (before tax) per 10 shares and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 10 new shares for every 10 shares for FY 2017, to shareholders of record on May 10
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on May 11 and the dividend will be paid on May 11
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/o8uEwP
